SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Animals
Represents an Animal toy with specific attributes including material and size.
AnimalsTest
Unit tests for the Animals class.
BoardGames
Represents a Board Game toy with a player range and a list of designers.
BoardGamesTest
Unit tests for the BoardGames class.
Figures
Represents a Figure toy with a specific classification.
FiguresTest
Unit tests for the Figures class.
Main
Main entry point for the Toy Store Management JavaFX application.
MainViewController
Controller class for managing toy inventory operations in the MainView.fxml interface.
MainViewControllerTest
Unit tests for the MainViewController class.
NegativeNumberException
Custom exception thrown when a negative number is provided for a field that only accepts non-negative values.
NegativeNumberExceptionTest
Unit tests for the NegativeNumberException class.
PlayerCountException
Custom exception thrown when the player count for a board game is invalid.
PlayerCountExceptionTest
Unit tests for the PlayerCountException class.
Puzzles
Represents a Puzzle toy with a specific type, such as Mechanical, Cryptic, Logic, Trivia, or Riddle.
PuzzlesTest
Unit tests for the Puzzles class.
Toy
Abstract superclass representing a general toy.
ToyTest
Unit tests for the abstract Toy class.
